documents.document: @Seb_Zein its making my travel plans difficult.

Apparently I'm now the only person in the family that knows how to use a computer??
My mom calls me "I need you to help me buy something on Amazon" I get downstairs and both of my brothers are sitting directly next to her.
(It's just because I'm really thirsty and my water bottle is empty.... I think)
Nothing stranger than being someone who literally never drinks and suddenly being like "I wouldn't mind some alcohol right now"
Managed to get the same spot that my brother and I shovelled this morning #success
Not many customers realize that what they're doing is a little bit dumb. I liked it.
Every few months there's a customer that really charms me. Today the guy said "There's no cure for the kind of stupidity I'm afflicted with"
I barely convinced myself to drive to IKEA today and I work here. Wtf are all these other people doing?
My car is my actual prince charming.
Every once in a while I'll move in a certain way and my ribs will crack, is this normal?
@timothyhudson I probably won't have cause to anyway
@timothyhudson okay but I think I'll hold back on that one anyway :P
@timothyhudson are we sure she's a reliable source of the current slang?
@timothyhudson so then you learned it from her?
@timothyhudson but is this just a friend of yours that you convinced to use it? :P
@timothyhudson it might be because I'm on mobile but that link just takes me to https://t.co/UgIZuqVBPg
@timothyhudson and tbh I'm not convinced you didnt just make up filmé
@timothyhudson sometimes my little brother tries to teach me things but I'm convinced he makes them up.
@timothyhudson okay but being an old lady means you cant make fun of me about it
@timothyhudson oh I thought you were saying that was an actual film called filmé. I dont understand slang. I'm an old lady.
@timothyhudson oh but I definitely havent seen that. I think. :P
@timothyhudson I did unexpectedly love that movie
@timothyhudson filmé? Is that even french? :P
@timothyhudson oh right hahaha I wonder if I've forgotten any other ones.
@timothyhudson oh that's pretty cool. I havent been to the movies in months.
@timothyhudson so they just play it early?
@timothyhudson how are you watching it the night before it comes out?
@timothyhudson yeah the live action was pretty good! Are you looking forward to Beauty and the Beast?
@timothyhudson its just what I grew up with! I'm also like the only person who likes Cinderella and Snow White
"Life is meant to get boring when you get older so it's not so disappointing when you die" This show is too quotable.
Topshop is selling velvet bathing suits and I didn't know that was a thing but I kind of want one.
I feel like I might be Ella from Please Like Me and I'm not unhappy about it.
Every bathing suit I want at Anthropologie is like $300+ and like while I could technically afford it it just hurts
Everyone knows the IKEA PS 2014 lamp looks like the death star. You are not clever, person on pinterest.
Maybe Netflix was the problem this whole time.
Well the internet is back.
Sometimes lying sideways on your bed just feels more introspective than lying on it properly. Is that just me?
@timothyhudson I also just sensed tension but Akal said I was crazy.
@timothyhudson i feel like she was being very professional and putting effort into a good show and he at one point came out smoking???
@timothyhudson I think maybe he gets himself too high
@timothyhudson I'm convinced the guy isn't going to last in the band.
@timothyhudson the performance was good but I just couldn't fully enjoy music I didnt know haha it was my fault.
@timothyhudson Beach House opened for VW, Phantogram opened for Metric but I saw them again last year. My friend got their drummer's stick!
@timothyhudson It's the only song I knew when I saw them live so I enjoyed it haha I regret that now though
I once again completely forgot about Phantogram. Definitely more dancy.
Also that I do NOT know all the words to Threat of Joy.
Quickly learning that the danciest music on my Spotify is Future Present Past.
@Mearcstappa ugh you Americans and your affordable phone plans
TV/ internet is out. Thank god for 4gb of data.
Th end of crazy stupid love is the absolute best.
Do you pronounce the second R in February?
Remember that time I bought a keyboard and used it like for one week.
I really need to get a hobby.
@timothyhudson did you expect a song by either of those people, let alone both, would be good?
@Mearcstappa what did I do now
@Mearcstappa a) Not a huge DC fan b) I am watching a show on Netflix, I'm watching TOO MUCH Netflix
I'm so bored and Netflix has asked me if I wanted to keep watching like 5 times now.
@timothyhudson It just ends on cliffhangers and that gets me every time.
I've been watching Please Like Me all day and it is SO hard not to constantly tweet quotes.
@timothyhudson The story's interesting!
@timothyhudson But also tbf none of the characters are really that interesting haha
@timothyhudson I don't know I just don't think she's special at all.
@timothyhudson Not at all! Betty's story is so much more interesting.
@timothyhudson See I like Betty so much more. I guess we don't agree on women either.
@timothyhudson Is he hot though? That's debatable.
@timothyhudson I want him to be more my type and sing and play a better song.
Seriously what do people do with full days off??? I'm so restless and I can't even leave the house because of snow ugghhhh
@hankgreen I feel like I just wasn't reading this question carefully enough. Almost like one of those trick questions from highschool...
Mom: " go build a snowman! This is the perfect time" little bro: "No, I'm waiting to play" lmao
Nevermind. My brother is apparently just waiting for the other people to finish playing now like this is too real.

Please note that Tinder is the worst.

@timothyhudson Never heard of him. But also how do you listen to the same song more than like twice in a row and not hate it?
@timothyhudson Weeeell I don't drink and I'd rather not do therapy so I really hope I don't fuck up too badly.
@timothyhudson I'm actually pretty scared that this is going to happen to me with my promotion. I dont know if I can handle responsibilities

@timothyhudson Don't you like need a degree to be an accountant?
@timothyhudson :( What happened?
@timothyhudson holy shit what! Why??

@timothyhudson oh okay. Is that just your shift or are you working late?
